metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: • Niçoise Cuisine: Originating from Nice, this cuisine includes dishes like Salade Niçoise, a salad with tuna, olives, and anchovies, and Socca, a chickpea flour pancake
Salade Niçoise is a perfect example of the Mediterranean diet, which emphasizes fresh vegetables, lean proteins, and healthy fats

Famous Dishes The South of France is home to many iconic dishes that you must try during your visit: • Bouillabaisse: A traditional fish stew from Marseille, made with various types of fish, shellfish, and a flavorful broth seasoned with saﬀron and herbs

Culinary Experiences In addition to dining at top restaurants, there are several culinary experiences you should consider: • Cooking Classes: Many towns and cities in the South of France oﬀer cooking classes where you can learn to prepare traditional dishes like bouillabaisse, ratatouille, and tarte tropézienne

extracted_sections.section_title: The sport is deeply rooted in local culture and is often accompanied by music and festivities, particularly in Arles from April to October

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • Niçoise Cuisine: Originating from Nice, this cuisine includes dishes like Salade Niçoise, a salad with tuna, olives, and anchovies, and Socca, a chickpea flour pancake.
• Tarte Tropézienne: A dessert from Saint-Tropez, consisting of a brioche filled with a creamy mixture of pastry cream and butter..

Famous Dishes The South of France is home to many iconic dishes that you must try during your visit: • Bouillabaisse: A traditional fish stew from Marseille, made with various types of fish, shellfish, and a flavorful broth seasoned with saﬀron and herbs.

Culinary Experiences In addition to dining at top restaurants, there are several culinary experiences you should consider: • Cooking Classes: Many towns and cities in the South of France oﬀer cooking classes where you can learn to prepare traditional dishes like bouillabaisse, ratatouille, and tarte tropézienne.
